title: Publish current build to live

requirements.text: Deploy the current build directly to the live environment, skipping the draft review stage. No code changes are needed — this is a promotion of the existing draft to production.

quotes: Di draft tidak ada komiknya, langsung saja going live

acceptanceCriteria: The current draft build is promoted and accessible as the live version.
No functional or visual changes are introduced during this deployment.

constraints: Do not modify any code — this is a straight promotion of the existing draft to live.
nonGoals: Fixing missing comic data — this is a data/seeding issue, not a code change.
Any UI or backend feature changes.
